import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' class UpdateAdvertisement extends React.Component { render() { const { ad } = this.props return (

Update advertisement

 ) } } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => { return { ad: state.ownAdvertisements.ads.find(adv => adv._id === ownProps.match.params.id) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(UpdateAdvertisement)
